items.desc:
24/7 - Alc. 4.7% Vol.
330ml
Suitable for vegans
Four big-hitting hops come together to create a sessionable, hop-forward pale ale with the intensity of a new world IPA. Amarillo, Chinook and Simcoe from the USA work in harmony with New Zealand’s Nelson Sauvin to produce a punchbowl aroma of lemon, tangerine and gooseberry, followed by a balanced grapefruit bitterness.

items.name: Afternoon Tea Mix
items.desc:
12 x 440ml
Six cans each of:
Jubilee (Alc. 4.0% Vol. Cucumber Pale Ale)
High Tea (Alc. 6.2% Vol. Jasmine Green Tea IPA)
Suitable for vegans

items.name: Baby-Faced Assassin
items.desc:
India Pale Ale - Alc. 6.1% Vol.
330ml
Suitable for vegans
Brewed with 100% Citra hops that create aromas of mango, apricot, grapefruit & mandarin orange, along with a lasting, juicy, tropical fruit bitterness, the Baby-Faced Assassin is a deceptively drinkable India Pale Ale that shouldn’t be taken lightly.

items.name: Better Late Than Never (Limited Edition)
items.desc:
New England IPA - Alc. 5.9% Vol.
12 x 440ml
Suitable for vegans
A brand new Outlaw Project beer. Heavily dry-hopped, intense fleshy, juicy tropical and citrus fruit aromas - notable mango, lemon and pine - are front and centre in the latest of our series of New England IPA's.

items.name: Discovery Mixed Case
items.desc:
A mixed case of our three best-selling cans; Yankee, 24/7 and Baby-Faced Assassin
Baby-Faced Assassin (Alc. 6.1% Vol. India Pale Ale)
24/7 (Alc. 4.7% Vol. Session IPA)
Yankee (Alc. 4.3% Vol. Pale Ale)
(24 x 330ml = eight cans of each beer / 12 x 330ml = four cans of each beer)

items.name: Hanging Gardens Of Basildon
items.desc:
Peach, Grapefruit & Basil Sour - Alc. 3.4% Vol.
330ml
Suitable for vegans
A mouth-watering and refreshingly tart kettle sour brewed with fleshy peach, zesty grapefruit and fresh basil. Juicy stone fruit notes do battle with sharp grapefruit citrusy characteristics to create a rolling punchbowl of flavour.

items.name: High Tea (Limited Edition)
items.desc:
Jasmine Green Tea IPA - Alc. 6.2% Vol.
12 x 440ml
Suitable for vegans
A blend of four hops, jasmine flowers and Taylors of Harrogate's Green Tea with Jasmine combine to create a mixed fruit and floral aroma, backed up by a balanced level of bitterness and a green tea finish.

items.name: Highway 51
items.desc:
Dry-Hopped Pale Ale - Alc. 3.7% Vol.
330ml
Suitable for vegans
Brewed with a blend of Mosaic, Centennial and Rakau hops, juicy, tropical fruit flavours come to the fore in this dry-hopped, sessionable pale ale that’s backed up by a hint of citrus and a grapefruit finish.

items.name: Jubilee (Limited Edition)
items.desc:
Cucumber Pale Ale - Alc. 4.0% Vol.
12 x 440ml
Suitable for vegans
A refreshing and outrageously drinkable cucumber pale ale originally brewed to celebrate Rooster's silver jubilee in 2018, inspired by summer garden and street parties. Cucumber sandwich, anyone?

items.desc:

Pilsnear (Alc. 4.8% Vol. Pilsner / Pale Ale Hybrid)
Baby-Faced Assassin (Alc. 6.1% Vol. India Pale Ale)

24/7 (Alc. 4.7% Vol. Session IPA)

Modern Classics Mixed Case
A mix of four modern classics; Pilsnear, Baby-Faced Assassin, One Trick Pony & Yankee
Pilsnear (Alc. 4.8% Vol. Pilsner / Pale Ale Hybrid)
Baby-Faced Assassin (Alc. 6.1% Vol. India Pale Ale)

Yankee (Alc. 4.3% Vol. Pale Ale)

items.name: One Trick Pony
items.desc:
Rose Lemonade Sour - Alc. 4.1% Vol.
330ml
Suitable for vegans
A sour beer originally brewed in collaboration with Hawkshead Brewery and Taylors of Harrogate. Bramling Cross hops offer a low-level of bitterness to this tart beer that carries a pink hue and floral and citrus notes from Taylors’ Rose Lemonade herbal tea infusion.

items.name: Pilsnear
items.desc:
Pilsner / Pale Ale Hybrid - Alc. 4.8% Vol.
330ml
Suitable for vegans
This pale ale isn’t quite a pilsner, but it’s been brewed with Noble hops from Germany and the Czech Republic, along with Pilsner and Munich malts, before being fermented at a low temperature.

items.name: Scrambler (Limited Edition)
items.desc:
Watermelon Pale Ale - Alc. 4.0% Vol.
12 x 440ml
Suitable for vegans
Delicate and easy-drinking, with an underlying fruitiness and a light, gentle level of bitterness. Subtle hop notes are complemented by the addition of watermelon in this crisp, fruity and refreshing pale ale.

items.name: Yankee
items.desc:
Original Pale Ale - Alc. 4.3% Vol.
330ml
Suitable for vegans
One of the original, new-style, pale ales to be brewed in the UK, Yankee® is a modern classic. Light and easy-drinking, it’s a beer that showcases the floral and citrus fruit aromas of the Cascade hop, grown in the Yakima Valley in Washington State, USA, projected against a back drop of soft Yorkshire water and Golden Promise pale malt.
